title: Riley Sheehan Eyes Stage Win at Vuelta: America’s Next Big Classics Star Ready to Attack
content:
From crit racing to the WorldTour, Sheehan hopes to cap his meteoric rise with a breakaway victory at the Vuelta: 'Good chances to go for a stage.'

Read the full article at Riley Sheehan Eyes Stage Win at Vuelta: America’s Next Big Classics Star Ready to Attack on Velo.
author: ahood
